entities.name: PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP
entities.description: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP is the auditing firm responsible for the audit of the company's consolidated financial statements. They have been serving as the company's auditor since 2004 and are based in San Jose, California.

entities.name: SAN JOSE
entities.description: San Jose is a city in California where PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP is located.

entities.name: THE COMPANY
entities.description: The company being audited, which has consolidated inventories and has provisions for excess or obsolete inventories.

entities.name: AUDIT COMMITTEE
entities.description: The audit committee is responsible for overseeing the auditing process and communicating critical audit matters.

relationships.relationship_description: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP is the auditor of the company's consolidated financial statements since 2004.
PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP communicates critical audit matters to the audit committee.
